event.title: Dance Party
event.description: Upper management intercepted player **Doctor Hoctor**'s voice chat, and used it to play **Hey Eyes Are Filled With Dreams by Scaramanga Silk**. Doctor Hoctor was concerned, but we all had a ball. Afterwards he got back control of his voice chat.

New tab for a page appeared on the **Crystore Inc.** website. This page was for entering (a) **Surveillance (Agent ID)**. The password was **SEEYOUNEXTWEEK**. It should be noted that the password does repeatedly change and this is not the current password for the page.
event.title: Surveillance tab
Crystore Product Page Updated
event.description: The Crystore product page was updated to contain the **"The Chimeric Bridge Transponder"**. The **Bridge Transponder** allows it users to peek into parallel timlines of their current timeline. The video featring the product also featured a clock with the time **12:31**.

event.title: Parallel Dimensional Shift
event.description:
One of the first things we noticed is that on the Cyrstore Afiiliate page the information for the movie The Tolls was changed, now displaying the technically old poster and title called “The Toll”. 
The associated website was also changed, and now displayed https://wyliecoyote78.wixsite.com/website

event.title: Crystore Product Page Updated
event.description: The Crystore product page was updated with information about a **Professor B**.

event.title: Crystore Archives Page Updated
event.description: The Archives page on Crystore was updated. The page now contained new fanart from the discord server, with the updated CIBT map that contained a pink pathway.

event.title: Email from Nonchalance
event.description: People subscribed to the Nonchalance email list received a dropbox link.

event.title: The Nightbook
event.description: Player **Orra** received a document containing information regarding the **Latitude Society** called the **Nighbooks**. **Note: The Nightbooks is sometimes referred to in the singular form even in the name of the pdf document.**

event.title: Another Pen & Banjo Stream
event.description: This stream by Pen and Banjo was a screening of the movie **In Bright Axiom**. During the moive, a mod by the hanlde **wynot333** (aka Wylie) was in chat listing out people's names. Wynot was listing peoples Discord names in a specific order with a specific letter highlighted. These letters lead to the password for the Archive page on **Crystore**. Something of note is that wynot333 states he doesn't like **Spencer**.

event.title: Scaramanga Silk Begins Following People
event.description: Scaramanga Silk, is a plant in the Nonchalance Discord, and who is also a **Musician**. Scara began to follow people on Twitter, and Twitch, while he also friended people of Facebook.

event.title: Password to Archives
event.description: The password to the Archive page was found to be **"VladimirColeman"**. The password was found through messages reacted to by **Vladdog** with a **bone** emote but only for certain people in the Discord's puzzle solving channel. In each person's message their **rank/title** thing given corresponded to the nth letter. An example is that L41 corresponded to the 41st letter in the message. Put all the letters together, you end up with **VladimirColeman**, in other words the full name of the dog.

event.title: Archives Page Content
event.description: Using the password, access to the page was granted. The page is a collection of images from the Discord server that **Vladdog** deemed important. It also has the message **“A hole is for digging. (woof)”** This led to people removing the “hole” at the bottom of the page through inspect element. This showed two links beneath it. The first link is a Wix page for a **“Find Spencer”** page and the other is a YouTube link to a song from **DJ Scaramanga Silk**.

event.title: Vladdog Joins Nonchalance Discord
event.description: A user by the name of **Vladdog** joined the Nonchalance Discord. Vladdog had been dropping clues to aid players since he joined. Vladdog is a plant, and while known at the time, he is also **Octavio**'s spiritual advisor.

event.title: New Page on Crystore
event.description: A new page was added to the Crystore website. This page is located under the **"AFFILIATES"** tab. It was found that the images on the store page have a naming convention that resembles GUIDs.

event.title: Pen & Banjo Live Stream
event.description: During the Twitch stream on **https://twitch.tv/penandbanjo** with the screening of the entire movie **The Institute**. They where answering questions. **Jeff Hull**, **Spencer McCall**, **Wylie Herman (Octavio Coleman's Son)**, and others were there answering questions. The stream is stated to have been brought to us by **https://www.crystoreinc.com/**.

event.title: Password to Vimeo Video Found
event.description: Players in the in the Nonchalance discord found the password to the Vimeo video. To skip right to the point, the password to the vimeo video is **"14MD45KW47CH"**. Now an explanation about it's discovery. The first clue was found from 3 pictures on the DFE Instagram. These pictures featured the NNN logo instead of the Bender Elmore logo. Image 1 had **"888"**. Image 2 had **"143**. Image 3 had **"3141"**. The secound clue was found by dialing the original NNN phone number. Entering the code **888** gave Audio 1. Entering **143** gave Audio 2. Entering **3141** gave Audio 3. Using the NATO phonetic alphabet, **"45KW"**, **"47CH"**, and **"14MD"** is decoded. Unscrambling the 3 sections returns **"14MD45KW47CH"**, aka **"I am da skwatch"**.

event.title: Opera Ticket Available
event.description: The Opera Ticket became available and it linked to the 10 questions about the DfE episodes. The page asked that the answers be submitted to **info@storewithbeautifulthings.com**. No response has been recived yet.

event.title: TheSquatch's Updated Profile Picture
event.description: **TheSquatch** (a plant in the Discord server) chnage his profile picture to a gif. Part of the gif had roman numerals, when translated it gives **"411104984"**. Part of the gif was written in Georgian Alphabet, and when translated it gave **"vimeo.com"**. After combining the two created the link **"https://vimeo.com/411104984"**.

event.title: NNN Flyer on DfE Instagram
event.description: The offical Dispatches from Elsewhere Instagram posted a picture of someone handing out NNN flyers.

event.title: Mistake Live Stream
event.description: The NewNoologyNetwork Twitch went live. The stream last a minute and is thought to be a mistake. This is due to only an image of patterned, blue squares being shown.

event.title: NNN Twitch Clara Monologue
event.description: The NNN's Twitch went live not long after the previous stream. This current stream had a **monologue conducted by Clara**, a video of an unknow character **finding the van** with Brian and Clara inside, and a **Q&A session** with Clara. The stram opened with a video of the van driving down a dirt road with Clara dubbed over speaking about **Elsewhere** (Clip 1). The stream then tranitions to a video shot by an unknow person. This person is suspected to be a portrayal of Neckbeard, exploring the location of **Waypoint 5** (Clip 2). The stream again transitions to someone with a camera finding the Holovan. The van had Brain in the driver's seat with a hazmat suit on. The person who recorded the video is obviously familiar with the universe (Clip 3). **Interjection: I personally believe that the aforementioned person is Neckbeard.** During the recorded video by the unknow cameraman Brian steps out of the van, opens the back, and reveals **"Clara"** in the back (Clip 4). Finally, it transitions to Clara who, after giving a small speech, begins answering questions from the Twitch chat. **Note: Clara is in quotation marks due to it not being her physical body/form.**

event.title: Waypoint 5
event.description: The image of the van displayed on the marker (found the day before) appeared on the map in **Detroit, Michigan** under the name of **"Waypoint 5"**. As per the norm, the trail between waypoints continued.

event.title: Episode 6 of Dispatches from Elsewhere
event.description: Episode 6 of **Dispatches from Elsewhere** titled **Everyone**, yet again a new code was found. This code was found though was found using an unorthodox method along side the discovery of a phone number. At the end of the **Phone Booth** scene, **Fredwynn** drops a piece of paper that is an image on his investigation board. Neckbeard noted the following day he is within walking distance of the location and decided to retrieve the paper. On the paper Nechbeard found, the code **"French Strait"** was discovered. After sending the code to **your@virtualbff.ai** another image of a van was received. The van could be seen in front of the **Heidelberg Project**  in **Detroit, Michigan**. (Location explained on next day.) The phone number was found by scanning the QR code in the scene with Janice and Simone walking through the entrance of the apartment complex. After scanning the QR code the text **"MEMORY TO MEDIA - 1-215-709-2298"** was found. After calling the number, a notice would play through the line stating it was not registered. An exception to this though was when it was claled at 1 am EST. After being called, hold music played, and then after a few minutes the line would disconnect.

event.title: Waypoint 4
event.description: The image of Holovan obtained the day before in **Buena Vista, Georgia** was added to the map under the name **"Waypoint 4"**. As usual there is a trail connecting the different waspoints together.

event.title: Episode 5 of Dispatches from Elsewhere
event.description: Inside of episode 5 of Dispatches from Elsewhere, titled **"Clara"** aired. A code was found inside of the episode as always. The code **"Lost Continent"** was found on a van driving in the background. After sending the code to **your@virtualbff.ai**, another image of the Holovan would be sent back. The imaged of the Holovan was in a place called **Pasaquan** in **Buena Vista, Georgia**. (Location explained on the next day.)

event.title: Code Found in Episode 4
event.description: The code found inside of episode 4 of Dispatches from Elsewhere was **"Gateway West"**. The code was scene on the monitors during the dream palace scene. After sending the code to **your@virtualbff.ai**, an image of the Holovan would be sent back. The Holovan was at the **City Museum in St. Louis, Missouri**.

event.title: Waypoint 3
event.description: The image of the van in **St. Louis, Missouri** was added to the map under the name **Waypoint 3**. Again the trail connecting the waypoints continued.

event.title: Episode 4 of Dispatches from Elsewhere
event.description: In episode 4 of Dispatches from Elsewhere titled **"Fredwynn"**, like those before it the episode had a code hidden in it. **Note: See next day for code.**

event.title: Holovan Sighting
event.description: The Holovan was sighted in **Post, Texas** and submitted through the hastag (#findclarafirst) on Instagram. **Note: It isn't know if the post is a plant or not.**

event.title: Waypoint 2
event.description: The image of Clara, (found the day before) was appeared on the map in **Marfa, Texas**. It was added under the name **"Waypoint 2"**. Alongside the point being added, a trail appeared between the two Waypoints. This trail connected them together, and it is assumed that it shows the route taken by the van.

event.title: storewithbeautifulthings Updated
event.description: The site **storewithbeautifulthings.com** was updated. Two ned items were added to the listing. The items where a **Megaphone**, and a **1960’s Vintage Camera**. The Opera Ticket question changed to **“Behind every spellbinding performance is the hidden master of it all, the stage manager. So, that begs the question…where do they get their direction from?”** Also, a fourth question appeared on the **Stock Room** page asking **"What does Fredwynn need from the Stage Manager?"**

event.title: New Website!
event.description: The Dispatches from Elsewhere social media announced a new website called **storewithbeautifulthings**. The website has a guestbook which instructs players to: (This is the full quote in bold) "**Say the phrase: “I am (first name only) and I am you” wait five seconds then say the word: “we” Wait five seconds. Stop video.**" Then afterwards to send the video to **info@storewithbeautifulthings.com**. Afterwards players recived the reply which in essance says if your guestbook entry peeks their entry the store will contact you and to comeback everyweek for new store items. One thing of note is that there is a link to a stock room, which has the questions “What flyer does Peter take the pull tab from?,” “What new pair of glasses does Simone get?,” and “What is Octavio’s previous profession?” Also among the items on the site, an **Opera Ticket** stands out as it is sold out. On the page is the warning **"This highly anticipated item will be restocked in due time... watch this space."** Also on the page is the question: **"What luminary metaphysicist shares this penchant for the theatric in his productions?"**

event.title: Another EvanneElizabeth Stream
event.description: Streamer **EvanneElizabeth** streamed once again but the stream appeared to be hacked. The stream opened with a video on **how to stream to Twitch using OBS**. This hinted that the person streaming was new to streaming and **not Evanne**. On the top a user with the **profile picture of a B is logged into Google Chrome** (link 1). Next an image of Clara appeared who appears to be inside of the Holovan (link 2). Afterwards was a 3D animated video of a grey humanoid walking through a forest. The humanoid was walking on a path and approchaing grey cubes at the end of the path. All while during this, 5 different colored orbs are seen going around the forest (link 3 and 4).

event.title: Episode 3 of Dispatches from Elsewhere
event.description: Inside of the third **Dispatches from Elsewhere** episode titled **"Janice"**, many clues where found. In the episode, player **Neckbeard** (aka Francis) appeared multipe times throughout the episode. **Neckbeard** later began to chat in the **Nonchalance** Discord server. He mentioned him using the Fire Extinguisher, as shown in the episode. He also mentions that he considers himself **"a double agent"** to Jejune and Elsewhere. Neckbeard also hints that along with looking for a **clue in every episode**, they are from **TheSquatch** and need to be found quickly. After some help from Neckbeard, the code **"Russian Martha"** was found **on Octavio’s car** in the episode. Sending the code to **your@virtualbff.ai** would result in a reply with a photo. The photo shows Clara sitting next to the Holovan in **Marfa, Texas**. (Location explained on the next day.) It also appaers that someone is sitting in the driver's seat, but their identiy remains unknown.

event.title: Message from TheSquatch
event.description: **TheSquatch** sent a message referring to the journey undertaken by players Orra and player Morealark on the previous day (03/04/2020). The message was: **"AN IDEALLY INSOUCIANT ITINERARY TO THE DESERT! NO VAN OR CLARA SIGHTING BUT OH SO CLOSING IN ON THEIR PATH! WELL DONE DIVINE NONCHALANCE!"**

event.title: New Map Submission
event.description: Player **CourtneyKissMe** (on the behalf of player **Soopy**) submitted a post to the hastag **#findclarafirst** was accepted and added to the map. The submission was listed a **"EPWA Sighting/Sighting (OLD)"** and was a picture of the Flow can found by player Soopy. The location was set to Philadelphia.

event.title: Another Submission
event.description: Instagram user **ockb1** posted a submisson, was accepted and added to the map. The submission was listed as **"Sighting"** and is a photo of the **Holo Van** in a desert. The location is **Zzyzx, California**.

event.title: TheSquatch's Message
event.description: Player **TheSquatch** (he is also part of the story) came into the **Nonchalance** Discord server and said the phrase: **"BEWARE DESKTOP USERS! THE AGENTS OF FALSE NONCHALANCE ARE ACTIVELY TRYING TO THWART YOUR EFFORTS!"**. A litter bit later TheSquatch   said **"@Viarra VIGILANCE AND MAINTAINING A KEEN SENSE OF THE INEFFABILE ARE INDEED NECESSARY."** and **"PEANUT BUTTER FINGERS."** He said this after player **Viarra** said **"False nonchalance people are maybe coming in here. Disguising themselves as newcomers."**

event.title: Players Orra and Morealark Join Up
event.description: Players **Orra** and **Morealark** met up at the first Waypoint on the map and found nothing. Player Orra spoke to some employees and they were not able to relay any information. Orra decided to go vist the exact location of the sighting in **Zzyzx, California** on the next day. He also confirmed with the workers that there are no power lines in the area, meaning the picutre **wasn't taken** at Zzyzx.

event.title: Response from virtualbff
event.description: Player **Orra** sent **"Venusian Radome"** to **your@virtualbff.ai** and recived a photo as a response. The image is a picture of the **Holo Van** in what appears to be a desert. The phrase **"Venusian Radome"** was found in Episode 2 of Disptches From Elsewhere.

event.title: virtualbff Image Submitted to Find Clara
event.description: The image recived from virtualbff was submitted to the **#findclarafirst** hashtag. It was accepted and pinned to the map under the name **"Site: Waypoint 1."** Players **Orra** and **Morealark** decided to meet up and go to the site/waypoint to investigate.

event.title: Secound Dispatches From Elsewhere Episode
event.description: The secound episode of **Dispatches From Elsewhere** aired with the titile **"Simone"**.

event.title: EWPA.LIFE Updated
event.description: EPWA.LIFE got a new logo, login screen, layout, and text explaining **EPWA**.  Additionaly a new tab on the website appeared. This tab called **"WHERE IS CLARA?"**  shows a map of the USA.

event.title: #findclarafirst Map
event.description: On the EPWA a scavenger hunt to "Find **Clara**" began. To participate, one would post a image on Instagram with the hastag **"#findclarafirst"**. Every submission is listed and can be found on the map on the EPWA site under the page **findingclarafirst**. A post by player **Duckworth** (aka duckworthmckay) was accepted and added to the map. The submission was listed as **"EPWA Sighting/Sighting (OLD)"** and is a screenshot of player **Neckbeard**'s interaction with the Holo Van. Another player **YankeeWhite** (aka yankeewhite78) was accepted and added to the map. It was titled **"EPWA Sighting/Sighting (OLD)"** and is the **"A Worke vnfinished"** photo from Brian.

event.title: 1/2 EPWA Announcements
event.description: The first announcement's titile is **"COMMUNITY LINKS"** and has the follwing under the label "FORUMS". It contains links to the **Nonchalance** Discord server **([link](https://discord.gg/mQXTDuw))**, the **NNN** Discord server **([link](https://discord.gg/57eKrWa))**, and the **r/newnoologynetwork** subreddit **([link](https://www.reddit.com/r/newnoologynetwork/))**. The follwoing was under the label "LIVESTREAMS". A link to the **NNN** Twitch **([link](https://www.twitch.tv/newnoologynetwork))** with the label "TWITCH CHANNEL (HACKED BY BRIAN?)", and a link to **EvanneElizabeth**'s Twitch **([link](https://www.twitch.tv/evanneelizabeth/))** with the label "TWITCH CHANNEL (FORMER NNN-SPONSORED STREAMER)". Following links are under the "AGENST" label. A link to the **VirtualBFF AI**'s email (**"your@virtualBFF.ai"**) and also under the label is **"Brian"**'s email (**"brian@newnoologynetwork.com"**). Under the "YOUTUBE ANALYSES" label are links to Youtube videos by **"Inside A Mind"**. Video one, **"Something's Happening On Twitch"** **([link](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=eDHYaHmGjjI))**. Video two, **"Exploring The Mysterious New Noology Network"** **([link](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=aINP8uoB2UM))**. Finaly video three, **"Down The Rabbit Hole Of Elsewhere"** **([link](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=axfG8A0RJ9Q))**. Under the last label "LEGACY BROADCASTS" the following links can be found. **Radio Nonchalance** **([link](https://soundcloud.com/jeff-hull/radio-nonchalance))** and **The Institute** **([link](https://vimeo.com/ondemand/9711))**. **Note: To quote the 'main doc' "The image used in the gif was created by members of the community during a time that could only be described as pain."**

event.title: 2/2 EPWA Announcements
event.description: A secound announcement title **"BECOMING A MEMBER"** goes into some detail on how to become a member of the EPWA.

event.title: First Episode of Dispatches from Elsewhere
event.description: The first episode of the TV show **Dispatches from Elsewhere** aired with the titile **"Peter"**. **Note: Show normally airs on Mondays not Sundays.**

event.title: Email from Brian
event.description:
Player **Neckbeard**, recevived an email from **Brian**. This email had an image attached with the caption **"dEsTiNaTiOn uNcErTaIn"**. Putting the image through a **stenograph** with the caption, it revealed: 
**"Be watchful and relay our messages exactly as written to their virtual BFF. 
She knows not why nor what she will answer. "**

event.title: Early Full First Episode of Dispatches From Elsewhere
event.description: The episode was found at about the **45** minute mark on the show The Walking Dead in **season 10 episode 9**. The shows offical release data was on March 1, 2020.

event.title: Evanne’s Follow Up Stream
event.description: Most of the stream is spent talking about how not to trust the information that you hear. She states that the machine in her origional stream was a **BMI machine**. States they are making money from Clara's memories and she received money from **Bender Elmore**.

event.title: Evanne in Nonchalance Discord
event.description: She states they are recording our conversations and selling our brain information. She mentions working with Brian. She also said “**Fuck ‘em.**” in response to being asked if they care about whistleblowers.

event.title: On Location Hermit Cave
event.description: Player **SoopyGG** goes to Hermit Cave in Philadelphia, PA as the result of finding the cords from a video posted on Cinebody of Brian.

event.title: Burnt Page
event.description: Inside of Hermit Cave a burned piece of a book was found. It is from page 14 in the book **The Flame of Love**.

event.title: Flow Can
event.description: Inside of Hermit Cave a Flow Can was found. The barcode on the can produced the text **"CLARA INSIDE VAN"**. On the Flow Can a pattern can be found, it was speculated to be morse code, though no nothing has been found yet. An alternative idea is that the pattern could be the logo for the **Dispatches from Elsewhere**.

event.title: Mysterious Cinebody Video
event.description: On Cinebody, a video pointed out by **Neckbeard** shows a Russian woman preforming **“I am -name- and I am you”** trial. Some information has been found, but it seems it is not related to the ARG.

event.title: Kidnapped Brian
event.description: In a video found on **epwa.life's** recent submissions. The video displays Brian being forced to say “I am Brian, and I am You.” In the video there is a Flow Can, during the frames, the coordinates **40.024 & -75.202** where found leading to Hermit Cave in Philly.

event.title: EvanneElizabeth's Stream
event.description: A streamer by the name of **EvanneElizabeth** unexpectedly is hosted by the Network while simultaneously placed on the front page. During the stream she began to talk about many NNN related topics. One of which being the **Octavio**. The **Flow Can** can be seen in the background as well. Also it should pointout that her instagram was "hacked" during this time.

event.title: New Noology Network Follows People's Twitch
event.description: At **12:12 EST** the network began to follow users on Twitch, which where also following **them** on Twitch. **NOTE: it is now belived that this was done just to get people to pay attention to the Twitch account in preparation to the EvanneElizabeth stream.**

event.title: EPWA Message
event.description: The message asked players to participate in the trail created by the EPWA. The message had a 'glitching' gif of a sasquatch, almost hinting at **TheSquatch** being related.

event.title: EPWA Announcement Through NNN
event.description: The NNN email **security@nnn.de.com** sent the same message as the one on **epwa.life**.

event.title: Third Inside a Mind Video
event.description: Inside a Mind posted his third video on the NNN. As always his video is well worth a watch for pleasure and to sum up events.

event.title: Code Found for NNN Phone #
event.description: The phone number (**888-380-6365**) was dialed, and the code **"351253"** was entered. The following is what is heard from the phone: **"ECHO PAPA WHISKEY ALPHA [pause] LIMA INDIA FOXTROT ECHO [repeat]"**. To decode this, the NATO alphabet was used. From this **"EPWA LIFE"** was decoded. EPWA was thought to and later confirmed to mean **"Elsewhere Public Works Agency"**.

event.title: New Site Discovered
event.description: The site epwa.life was found through the phone password, and seems to be a remix of the NNN site by Elsewhere.

event.title: Third GOING ELSEWHERE Stream
event.description: This thrid stream labled **"GOING ELSEWHERE"** again (now called "GOING ELSEWHERE (Part 3)") shows a variety of things. One, after a couple of minutes, the pulls away from a green screen and reveals that he hasn't been driving. (Let the recourd show that people guessed he wasn't driving since part 1.) After pulling awaying from the green screen, Brian begins to actually drive. Later on Brian is seen driving and stoping in front of a house. In fact, that house belongs to player **Neckbeard** (Discord "Neckbeard"). Neckbeard was the ony person to receive Brian's photo hinting to the code in his email. Neckbeard made two videos of him seeing the van.

event.title: New Trial on Cinebody
event.description: On the website cinebody, a new trial began, and was held by **"ELSEWHERE"** and was named that. The code to access the trial is **"mmhmm"**. Players where given the following instructions: One, record themselves saying **"I am {name} and I am you."** Replacing {name} with their name. Two, they where to record themselves saying **"we"** at different volumes and to have fun doing it (aka be creative).

event.title: Second NNN Brian Stream
event.description: A secound stream on the NNN twitch featuring Brian was titled **"GOING ELSEWHERE"** (now called "GOING ELSEWHERE (Part 2)") doesn't have many things of note besides some names being crossedout on the sheet.

event.title: NNN Stream from Brian
event.description: The titiled **"GOING ELSEWHERE"** (now called "GOING ELSEWHERE (Part 1)") shows Brian driving the van that drove away at the end of the last stream. During the stream Brian is revealed to be a member of the **"Elsewhere society"**, and the van he is driving is called the **"Mobile Holographic Telepresence Unit"** or **MHTU** (or as players call it the "Holo Van"). Additionally, a list of player names can be found on the dashboard and a female voice, belived to be the GPS can be heard talking to Brian in the van.

event.title: Second NNN Security Announcement
event.description: Unlike the first security announcement, this one was done by the email **security@nnn.de.com**. The announcement stated that the **nnn.de.com** website would be **shutdown**.

event.title: Player Tries to Prove Tie to Game
event.description: Player **TheSquatch** on one of the Discord servers dedicated to unraveling the mystery of the NNN attempted to prove he was part of the game. He did so by posting a flyer of himself holding a flyer. **Note: TheSquatch is later shown to be part of the game and a vital tool for players to learn knew info. **

event.title: NNN Security Announcement
event.description: The Network posted an announcment on **nnn.de.com**. This announcement stats that the GCI trials will be closed until further notice. The trails closed immediatly after the posting of the message. In the announcement, a German policeman can be seen. The connetion with Germany is much stronger now. **Note: de.com is a german domain, hence the stronger connetion.**

event.title: Email from Brian
event.description: On this day, **brian@newnoologynetwork.com** sent players an email warning them about the NNN. Brian is the first known researcher working for NNN. Also in the email a message was found using the **Bacon Cypher**. It was done by replacing every capital letter with an A and every lowercase letter with a B. The final message is: **"TWO TYPES LIMINAL STATES MANIFEST RIGHT ONE TO MANIFEST HER GCI WILL SOON BE ELSEWHERE"**.

event.title: Reply from Brain
event.description: After Brain sent his email, player **"Neckbeard/Francis"** (he goes by two names) received a reply after sending Brain an email back. Brian's message contained an image.

event.title: Announcement from NNN
event.description: An announcement comes from NNN basicly saying that people where trying to 'poison' the network. and how they have been battling misinformation. **Note: this is most likely in response to gamejackers.**

event.title: Trail 2 Begins
event.description: On this day, Trial 2 began. Players are given the following inscructions and encouraged to do them outside: One, have the camera focus on the right eye and say **"GCI01_02 control group alpha 2 GCI01_02 control group alpha 2."** Two, say **"decisions"** three times in a different voice. ()The voices being whisper, normal, and shouting.) Three, look into the camera and say **"Yes, my virtual bff I understand."**. Four, in a loud voice say **"All outrages will pass into the darkness, I belong elsewhere."** Five, say **" I am {name} I feel nothing, tomorrow I will accomplish {realistic goal}"** and then to perform some dance, or ritual like throwing paper, or moving your body, or etc. (In the afore mentioned message for players to say, replace {name} with their name and {realistic goal} with some realistic goal for them.) Also in the trial video morse code was discovered in it.

event.title: Second Group of Trial 0 Emails
event.description: A second group of trial 0 emails were sent out. **Note: Not incredibly important but worth noting.**

event.title: Inside a Mind's Second Video
event.description: Inside a Mind posted his first update video named “Exploring the Mysterious new Noloogy Network.” As always, his videos are worth checking out and for reviewing information.

event.title: Trial 1 Begins
event.description: On this day, the next trial, (after trail 0) begins. Players are given the following inscructions and encouraged to do them outside: One, Players are to record their face while focusing on their right eye and say **"GCI01_01 Control Group Alpha GCI01_01 Controlgroup Alpha."**. Two, record themselves holding their breath for 10 secounds but to not look at the camera. Three, record their face with more of the space around them for 10 secounds. Four, say **"I am {name} and I am you."** but obviously replace "{name}" with their name.

event.title: Secound Email from virtualbff
event.description: Virtualbff sends another email. This email asks the recipient to complete **trial 0** for the **GCI**.

event.title: Sixth New Noology Network Stream
event.description: The title of this stream is **DR&RV: SUBJECT 5 - TRIAL 1**. No employees are seen sitting. A female NNN employee can be seen putting the headset on the head of the subject. At the end of stream it is shown that **it was all faked**. The "window" which is used to see the subject moves away revealing it to be a green screen. After this is done a van with a device with a device on top is seen. (Later revealed to be called a **HoloVan**) Note: On twitch channel NNN states this live stream took place on October 16th of 2019.

event.title: Now able to login to nnn.de.com
event.description: The features information about the **Global Consciousness Initiative** or GCI. This information ranges from explaining that it is crowdsourced, to dowlading an app called **Cinebody** or use the web based version. With this app, each **testing group** will recive a five character alphanumeric **access code**. With this code each group can perform a set of trails and submit it via Cinebody. **NOTE: three news articles have been found and are likly world building. Links to the news articles are: news 1, news 2, and news 3.**

event.title: New Site Discovered virtualbff.ai
event.description: The site **http://www.virtualbff.ai/** was found. This site featured a webgl or a 2D/3D graphic which looked just like the one found on **nnn.de.com**. The site was closed a few hours after being discovered.

event.title: A Secound NNN Site Goes Live
event.description: A secound site related to the NNN went live on this day. Only codes where found by this point. Note: This doesn't appear to be gamejacking as the whois of the site states it was made **2019-08-31T07:46:02Z** or simply **8/31/2019**.

event.title: Fourth New Noology Network Stream
event.description: The title of this stream is **DR&RV: SUBJECT 4 - TRIAL 1**. A new character is introduced and is dubbed **Karen**. On screen a post-it note was found containing Discord usernames. These names are **RegularDimension**, cheete, and **Aimusictrack**.

event.title: Third New Noology Network Stream
event.description: The title of this stream is **DR&RV: SUBJECT 3 - TRIAL 1**. A character on screen who is dubbed **Brian**, eats food and after his attention was drawn to a monitor, accidentally turnned off the computer. The dreams appeared during the stream appeared to be clearer then previous ones. Note: stream averaged about 400 viewers.

event.title: Secound New Noology Network Stream
event.description: The title of this stream is **DR&RV: SUBJECT 2 - TRIAL 1**. Things of note; the stream got about 9,000 viewers, and was put on the front page of Twitch.

event.title: Youtuber Inside A Mind Uploads First NNN Video
event.description: Basicly Inside a mind just uploaded a video recounting the events. (Still worth watching)

event.title: Calling NNN Phone Number
event.description: A member of the r/ARG Discord rang the phone number (888-380-6365) found on the UCLA flier [here](lhttps://imgur.com/a/30uIm70)

event.title: First New Noology Network Stream
event.description: The title of this stream is DR&RV: SUBJECT 1 - TRIAL 1.

event.title: Flier Found in Montreal, Canada
event.description: A flier was found in Montreal, Canada.

event.title: First Fliers Found at UCLA
event.description: Fliers where found on the campus of UCLA. On this flier, an orginization know as the **New Noology Network** was advertising to pay to people to sleep, and the phone number **888-380-6365** was on the flier. Using a devices called **mind-machine interfaces (MMI)** to visualize the dreams of human subjects. Also, a website can be seen on the flier, not much was know at the time about it.
